    About Marc Austin Highfill


    Marc Austin Highfill was born and raised in the West End of Richmond. He graduated from Douglas Freeman High School and VCU with a degree in Marketing and a concentration in Real Estate. He founded Austins, a special event and marketing company, in 1986. Marc was named Young Entrepreneur of The Year for the State of Virginia in 1991. He was a partner in a local Richmond real estate firm from 1999 until he opened EXIT First Realty on June 2, 2006.

    Marc has grown his business and reputation through years of dedication to his clients and the use of innovative marketing techniques. Marc Austin Properties averages 5-6 sales every week. As we continue to grow, our team is always seeking qualified agents to add to our award-winning team. We look forward to providing you with exceptional, unparalleled coaching and support to help grow your business to the next level.

    Marc Austin Highfill
